scripts.brand:zip: bash -lc 'stamp=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S); zip -j public/ClickApp_BrandAssets_$stamp.zip public/clickapp_icon_ink.svg public/clickapp_icon_white.svg public/clickapp_wordmark_ink.svg public/clickapp_wordmark_white.svg public/clickapp_lockup_horiz_ink.svg public/clickapp_lockup_horiz_white.svg public/clickapp_lockup_stacked_ink.svg public/clickapp_lockup_stacked_white.svg public/icon-192.png public/icon-512.png public/favicon-16.png public/favicon-32.png public/favicon.ico public/og-image.png public/og-image-dark.png public/motto/motto-hero-light.svg public/motto/motto-hero-dark.svg && echo ClickApp_BrandAssets_$stamp.zip'
scripts.brand:update-link: /usr/bin/perl -0777 -i -pe 'BEGIN{ $ENV{zip}=qx/ls -t public\/ClickApp_BrandAssets_*.zip 2>\/dev\/null | head -n1 | xargs -n1 basename/; chomp $ENV{zip}; } s#]*>\s*Download All Assets\s*<\/a>#sprintf("Download All Assets", $ENV{zip})#se' public/brand.html
scripts.brand:all: npm run images && npm run favicons && npm run brand:zip && npm run brand:update-link && npm run brand:add-guidelines && npm run brand:stamp
scripts.brand:add-guidelines:
/usr/bin/perl -0777 -i -pe 'unless (/Usage Guidelines — Minimum Sizes/s){ s#(

Bundle

)#

Usage Guidelines — Minimum Sizes

  • Screen: Horizontal lockup ≥ 32px height, Stacked lockup ≥ 80px width.
  • Print (300 DPI): Horizontal lockup ≥ 1.0 in / 25.4 mm, Stacked lockup ≥ 0.75 in / 19 mm.

These minimums ensure legibility across digital and print applications. Always proof test before final production.

$1#s }' public/brand.html
scripts.brand:stamp:
/usr/bin/perl -0777 -i -pe 'BEGIN{ $ENV{zip}=qx/ls -t public\/ClickApp_BrandAssets_*.zip 2>\/dev\/null | head -n1 | xargs -n1 basename/; chomp $ENV{zip}; } s#(Download All Assets)(?![\s\S]*?Latest:)#sprintf("$1\n

Latest: %s

", $ENV{zip})#se' public/brand.html
